A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson did the Star Wars community a disservice with this movie. Unlike the force awakens\, this movie did damage to the saga. The critics are on crack. This movie had some good moments which were vastly overshadowed with the godawful moments that just ruined the film. It a must see for Star Wars fans only so you can witness the work of someone who unintentionally delivered a critical blow to the saga we all love.
